headline: Moderna Narrows Loss, Reiterates 10% Revenue Growth Target
summary: Moderna said it continues to target 10% revenue growth this year, as the company’s fourth-quarter loss narrowed from a year earlier.

headline: Moderna beats Q4 expectations, but stock edges lower on FDA setback
summary: Investing.com -- Moderna, Inc. (NASDAQ:MRNA) reported better-than-expected fourth quarter results on Thursday, though shares fell 0.8% with the company disclosing a regulatory setback for its influenza vaccine in the United States.

content.title: Moderna beats Q4 expectations, but stock edges lower on FDA setback
content.summary: Investing.com -- Moderna, Inc. (NASDAQ:MRNA) reported better-than-expected fourth quarter results on Thursday, though shares fell 0.8% with the company disclosing a regulatory setback for its influenza vaccine in the United States.

headline: Moderna beats quarterly revenue estimates on resilient sales of COVID shot
summary: Feb 13 () - Moderna reported fourth-quarter revenue above ‌Wall Street estimates on ‌Friday, banking on better-than-expected sales ​of its COVID-19 vaccine in the U. The Cambridge, Massachusetts-based company has been struggling ‌financially as ⁠demand for COVID vaccines collapsed in the ⁠years following its pandemic windfall.

headline: Moderna (NASDAQ:MRNA) Exceeds Q4 CY2025 Expectations
summary: Biotechnology company Moderna (NASDAQ:MRNA) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, but sales fell by 29.8% year on year to $678 million. Its GAAP loss of $2.11 per share was 18.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: Moderna (NASDAQ:MRNA) Exceeds Q4 CY2025 Expectations
content.summary: Biotechnology company Moderna (NASDAQ:MRNA) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, but sales fell by 29.8% year on year to $678 million. Its GAAP loss of $2.11 per share was 18.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: FDA Flu Setback Tests Moderna Valuation And Future mRNA Vaccine Pipeline
summary: U.S. FDA issues a Refusal to File for Moderna's mRNA flu vaccine BLA, citing concerns with the trial comparator rather than safety or efficacy. Moderna, ticker NasdaqGS:MRNA, says the trial design and comparator were agreed in advance with the FDA, raising questions about changing regulatory expectations. Reports of FDA leadership overruling internal expert staff have drawn attention to potential shifts in U.S. vaccine policy and oversight. For you as an investor, this sits at the core of...

content.title: FDA Flu Setback Tests Moderna Valuation And Future mRNA Vaccine Pipeline
content.summary: U.S. FDA issues a Refusal to File for Moderna's mRNA flu vaccine BLA, citing concerns with the trial comparator rather than safety or efficacy. Moderna, ticker NasdaqGS:MRNA, says the trial design and comparator were agreed in advance with the FDA, raising questions about changing regulatory expectations. Reports of FDA leadership overruling internal expert staff have drawn attention to potential shifts in U.S. vaccine policy and oversight. For you as an investor, this sits at the core of...

headline: Moderna Just Crushed Estimates While Everyone Was Looking the Other Way
summary: Moderna (NASDAQ: MRNA) reported fourth-quarter results Friday morning that beat Wall Street’s muted expectations, delivering revenue of $678 million against estimates of $663 million and a loss of $2.11 per share compared to the expected loss of $2.64. The biotech’s shares had climbed 36% year-to-date through February 12 as investors anticipated signs of stabilization in ... Moderna Just Crushed Estimates While Everyone Was Looking the Other Way

headline: Moderna Reports a Narrower-Than-Expected Loss. The Stock Slips After Earnings.
summary: Shares of  Moderna  slipped Friday after the drugmaker reported better-than-expected quarterly results.  The company posted a fourth-quarter loss of $2.11 a share on revenue of $678 million.  Moderna  stock was down 0.3% in premarket trading Friday.

content.title: Moderna Reports a Narrower-Than-Expected Loss. The Stock Slips After Earnings.
content.summary: Shares of  Moderna  slipped Friday after the drugmaker reported better-than-expected quarterly results.  The company posted a fourth-quarter loss of $2.11 a share on revenue of $678 million.  Moderna  stock was down 0.3% in premarket trading Friday.
